local Tool = script.Parent;
enabled = true
function onActivated() if not enabled then return end
enabled = false
Tool.Handle.DrinkSound:Play()
wait(1)
local h = Tool.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if (h ~= nil) then if (Tool.Parent:FindFirstChild("SpeedEffect") == nil) then local s = script.Parent.SpeedEffect:Clone() s.Disabled = false s.Parent = Tool.Parent end end
wait(45) enabled = true
end
script.Parent.Activated:connect(onActivated)

-- assume we are in the character, let's check function sepuku() script.Parent = nil end
local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
local h = script.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if (h == nil) then sepuku() end
local torso = script.Parent:FindFirstChild("Torso") if (torso == nil) then sepuku() end
local head = script.Parent:FindFirstChild("Head") if (head == nil) then head = torso end
local equalizingForce = 236 / 1.2 -- amount of force required to levitate a mass local gravity = .75 -- things float at > 1 local fire = Instance.new("Fire") fire.Color = Color3.new(0, .3, 1) fire.SecondaryColor = Color3.new(0, 1, .5) fire.Parent = head fire.Heat = 10 fire.Size = 3
h.WalkSpeed = 30
local partsList = script.Parent:GetChildren() local snowwelds = {} local snowballs = {}
for i = 1, #partsList do if partsList[i].className == "Part" and partsList[i].Name ~= "Head" then -- snowball it snowball = Instance.new("Part")
snowballSize = partsList[i].Size.X if partsList[i].Size.Y > snowballSize then snowballSize = partsList[i].Size.Y end if partsList[i].Size.Z > snowballSize then snowballSize = partsList[i].Size.Z end snowballSize = snowballSize * math.sqrt(2) if partsList[i].Name == "Torso" then snowballSize = snowballSize * math.sqrt(2) end
--snowball.Size = partsList[i].Size snowball.Size = Vector3.new(snowballSize, snowballSize, snowballSize) snowball.Shape = 0 snowball.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Institutional white") snowball.Material = "Concrete" snowball.TopSurface = "Smooth" snowball.BottomSurface = "Smooth"
snowWeld = Instance.new("Weld") snowWeld.Part0 = partsList[i] snowWeld.Part1 = snowball
snowWeld.Parent = script.Parent snowball.Parent = script.Parent
table.insert(snowwelds, snowWeld) table.insert(snowballs, snowball) end end
function recursiveGetLift(node) local m = 0 local c = node:GetChildren() if (node:FindFirstChild("Head") ~= nil) then head = node:FindFirstChild("Head") end -- nasty hack to detect when your parts get blown off
for i=1,#c do if c[i].className == "Part" then if (head ~= nil and (c[i].Position - head.Position).magnitude < 10) then -- GROSS if c[i].Name == "Handle" then m = m + (c[i]:GetMass() * equalizingForce * 1) -- hack that makes hats weightless, so different hats don't change your jump height else m = m + (c[i]:GetMass() * equalizingForce * gravity) end end end m = m + recursiveGetLift(c[i]) end return m end
-- debris:AddItem(force,0.5)
function pushIt() --local mass = recursiveGetLift(h.Parent) local force = torso:FindFirstChild("IceForce") if force == nil then force = Instance.new("BodyVelocity") force.Name = "IceForce" force.velocity = Vector3.new(0,0,0) force.P = recursiveGetLift(h.Parent)*5 force.maxForce = 3*Vector3.new(force.P,0,force.P) force.Parent = torso end force.velocity = (torso.Velocity*Vector3.new(1,0,1)*3/10 + force.velocity*7/10) end
for i = 1, 450 do -- 45 seconds pushIt() wait(.1) end
h.WalkSpeed = 16
for i = 1, #snowwelds do snowwelds[i]:remove() end for i = 1, #snowballs do snowballs[i]:remove() end
fire:remove() iceForce = torso:FindFirstChild("IceForce") if iceForce ~= nil then iceForce:remove() end
sepuku()

enabled = true function onButton1Down(mouse) if not enabled then return end
enabled = false mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\ArrowFarCursor.png" anim:Play() wait(46) mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\ArrowCursor.png" enabled = true
end
function onEquippedLocal(mouse)
if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end anim = Tool.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid"):LoadAnimation(Tool.drink) mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\ArrowCursor.png" mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() onButton1Down(mouse) end) end
function onUnequippedLocal()
anim:Stop() anim:remove() anim = nil
end
Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal)
